com.jurajmasar.ib.dossier.files

Class DesEncrypter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jurajmasar.ib.dossier.files.DesEncrypter

  • public class DesEncrypter
extends java.lang.Object
    Encrypting and decrypting interface for Strings. All Strings remain in Base64! Originally from: http://www.exampledepot.com/egs/javax.crypto/PassKey.html
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Juraj Masar
